tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Artificial Teeth,Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: In short, treatment with Dr Santosh is painless and as the clinic name correctly says - Happy. He will explain the problem accurately, give you the options and then proceed so fast and smoothly that before u know it, the procedure is over. The equipment at the clinic is top notch - especially the new scanning machine. His work is very neat and he knows exactly what you are feeling. It is not low cost but then I feel the cost is worth the quality. And when it's your teeth, nothing but the best should do.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental X-Ray,Dental Implant Fixing,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: What defines Dr Santosh Nayak as a great Dentist, is the fact that he uniquely combines warmth, empathy, caring, honesty, professionalism, communication and the latest dental technology, to reach out and protect each and every patient who walks into his clinic.  He is meticulous and thorough in his approach, ensuring he never misses anything that needs dental attention, but is at the same time mindful of each patient's needs and constraints, and manages to work around this to the benefit of each individual.  I was very fortunate to have been refered to him through a close friend and have been very pleased with the diagnosis, advice and treatment received - not just for me, but my family as well. A million thanks for taking care of us Santosh!!!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had a great experience at Dr. Santosh’s clinic. The staff is friendly, and the office is clean. Dr. Santosh patiently explained the procedure, making me feel at ease. The dental work was good , and I'm satisfied with the results. 
Kudos to “happy tooth”!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited doc for implants. Since I was very unhappy and dissatisfied with my previous treatment I wasn't sure to go ahead with such an expensive treatment. But doc assured & gave me full guarantee which made me change my mind. It's been almost 6 months now and I have to say I have never felt this comfortable inside my mouth. The treatment was worth every penny spent. One of his best qualities, he will still message and ask for any discomfort. For him, his patients are a priority event after the treatment is done. Most honest , friendly and a warm doctor. God bless you dear Santosh. I
reply_text: Thank you for making the time to write such a kind feedback. We hope to have fulfilled your treatment concerns!!!

tags: None
review: Dr. Santosh Nayak's clinic is close to my place... So had been to him for filling composite for the first time then after 8-9 months had referred few of my neighbors to him they all were very happy with the way he treated them. Almost last December went to him for extracting my wisdom tooth which I knew would pain a lot but never notice when he removed it with a very delicate hand and sharing a joke at the same time. I just couldn't belive that he just showed me my tooth and it was extracted neatly.  I will always visit him for all my dental problems near future and also do recommend him to my family n friends...  HAPPY TOOTH DCC one of the best in mahim... all smilezz..
reply_text: Thank u nihar sir ..

tags: None
review: I am an onco patient and was very unsatisfied with the previous denture I wore. I came across Dr Nayak few days back  and I happen to ask him what best he can do for me . Doctor suggested me to opt for a new denture . I readily agreed as the doctor showed lots of confidence in his words,However my new denture was ready in a weeks time and I was very much comfortable with new dentures given to me at a very reasonable cost . I sincerely thank him from bottom of my heart for being very patient and doing a wonderful job . I am sure he knows exactly how to treat his patients well and do the right job with  minimum expenditure to the patient. I appeal to each one of you about his excellence in dental work and also his humble and polite nature towards his patients . God bless you my dear son and may he bring you lots of success in the coming years .

tags: None
review:
I was looking for a change of dentist, since a bad experience during my last time. I happened to visit Dr. Santosh Nayak after getting lot of good reviews from a few friends.
Happened to go across for a root canal treatment and my feedback is as follows.
Expertise is top class, since I've been through a root canal previously, and this one has been far less painful. Also, I could get away with treatment of just one tooth, instead of treating 2 teeth, as per my earlier doctor.
Clinic is very up-to-date, and clean, which has a very calming effect on the mind.
I am definitely going to go to him for any of my dental problems.
